context: Hi, I'm looking for a good old school Disney animated movie. I enjoyed Robin Hood (1991) . Do you know of any good ones?
I saw Frozen (2013) , but have not yet seen Ferdinand (2017) . It looks good, though.
resp: Ferdinand (2017) was TERRIFIC! If you like old school there is always Bambi (1942) and Snow White (1995)
